page.title: 01SPETISBURY/CHARLTON MARSHALL
page.content: Our block covers{Spetisbury}(pop.420) and{Charlton Marshall}(pop.820)and the surrounding farmland. Some families especially those in farming have lived here for generations and older residents have seen many changes such as the decline of the railway and increase of road traffic.Now many people have moved in from all parts of Britain,most work outside the villages in{Poole}or{Bournemouth,}but are attracted by village life.There are many village activities.Housing varies from old cottages now modernised,to bungalows which attract many retired people and new houses in{Charlton which have increased the number of young families.Alongside more usual rural industries{Spetisbury}has a watercress farm,{Charlton}a fibreglass business and a garden centre and {Keynston Mill}a fruit farm.
